content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to activate the arcgis environment using various paths, but all resulted in errors. The latest development involved multiple attempts to activate the environment using different paths, but all resulted in the error message "No such file or directory". The AI responded with various attempts to execute shell commands using different paths, but all
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb'bash: line 1: /opt/anaconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh: No such file or directory\\n'", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "bash -c \'source /home/kat/anaconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh && conda activate arcgis && python -c \\"import arcgis; print(arcgis.__version__)\\"\'"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb'bash: line 1: /home/kat/anaconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh: No such file or directory\\n'", type='action_result')]
"""
